name: Legend 3008
description:
* A total of 3 challenging tracks
* 1 Free Ride Section
* Realistic and highly Realistic Cockpit Controls
* Customize your own vehicle and use various accessories
* Radio, Air Conditioning, Telephone, Seat Heating etc. control controls
* Realistic Speedometer, Engine Speed, Signage Reading systems
* Realistic Gear and Steering Controls
* Parking camera and parking sensors
